caption.p:
The scatter plot of PCC and Normalized RMSE is shown for five variables: ( a) Surface Air Temperature, ( b) Precipitation, ( c) Precipitable Water ( d) Surface Evaporation and ( e) Total Cloud for three different domains: (i) Monsoon, (ii) Tropical and (iii) Global domains. Red and Green colors represent 2° and 1° resolutions, respectively. We use JJAS mean for monsoon domain and tropical domain, and JJA mean for global domain to correlate with MERRA reanalysis. TRMM dataset was used for precipitation in Monsoon and Tropical domains owing to higher accuracy. The various parameters represented here are from the Zhang-McFarlane convection scheme. Figure is created using the NCAR/NCL
52 software version 6.3.0, https://www.ncl.ncar.edu.
